summary: This is an email forwarding a news article from The Daily Beast about federal investigators questioning Jeffrey Epstein's victims regarding sex-trafficking crimes. The email notes that the article does not mention the sender's office.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article, which reports that federal investigators are asking his victims about sex-trafficking crimes.

events.title: News Article on Federal Investigation
events.description: The Daily Beast publishes an article reporting that federal investigators are questioning Jeffrey Epstein's victims about sex-trafficking crimes.

keyFacts: A news article from The Daily Beast on June 3, 2019, reports federal investigators are questioning Jeffrey Epstein's victims about sex-trafficking crimes.
The email forwarding the article notes that the article does not mention the sender's office (implied to be a U.S. Attorney's Office).
The document is an internal email forwarding external media coverage of the ongoing investigation into Epstein.
